Base:Descriptions.Base:Description: the grand entrance courtyard of the papal palace

Surrounded on all four sides by tall limestone walls, this open-air courtyard is landscaped into quadrants around raised garden beds. To the north stands a stone wall nearly fifteen feet high with a large wooden door centrally placed. The remaining three walls are the estate itself, the limestone facade spotted with windows. Overhead to the south is a small balcony on the second floor, the wooden double doors matching those that stand to the south. Slate stepping stones meander around the circumference of the garden through the various flora planted in the garden space.

To the north stands a stone wall nearly fifteen feet high with a large wooden door centrally placed. The remaining three walls are the estate itself, the limestone facade spotted with windows. Overhead to the south is a small balcony on the second floor, the wooden double doors matching those that stand to the south. Slate stepping stones meander around the circumference of the garden through the various flora planted in the garden space.

Surrounded on all four sides by tall limestone walls, this open-air courtyard is landscaped into quadrants around raised garden beds. To the north stands a stone wall nearly fifteen feet high with a large wooden door centrally placed. The remaining three walls are the estate itself, the limestone facade spotted with windows. Overhead to the south is a small balcony on the second floor, the wooden double doors matching those that stand to the south. Slate stepping stones meander around the circumference of the garden through the various flora planted in the garden space.
second-floor balcony

The second-floor balcony of the open-air entryway provides a view of the courtyard below. Crafted from thick planks of lacquered golden oak, the balcony extends along the south wall with a sturdy balustrade surrounding the outer edge.

The second-floor balcony of the open-air entryway provides a view of the courtyard below. Crafted from thick planks of lacquered golden oak, the balcony extends along the south wall with a sturdy balustrade surrounding the outer edge.
a pair of double doors leading east
Leading east is a pair of double doors crafted from golden oak. $(parent-desc)
Leading east is a pair of double doors crafted from golden oak. $(parent-desc)
a heavy wooden door leading north
A heavy, iron-barred wooden door is set in the tall stone wall surrounding the estate. $(parent-desc)
A heavy, iron-barred wooden door is set in the tall stone wall surrounding the estate. $(parent-desc)
a pair of double doors leading south

Leading south into the estate, these wooden double doors are outfitted with small diamond-shaped windows, one on each door at the ideal height to provide a glimpse through the door before answering. $(parent-desc)

Leading south into the estate, these wooden double doors are outfitted with small diamond-shaped windows, one on each door at the ideal height to provide a glimpse through the door before answering. $(parent-desc)
a wooden door leading west
Leading west is a simple wooden door crafted from golden oak. $(parent-desc)
Leading west is a simple wooden door crafted from golden oak. $(parent-desc)
the northwest corner
The northwest corner of the courtyard.
The northwest corner of the courtyard.
the southeast corner
The southeast corner of the courtyard.
The southeast corner of the courtyard.
the southwest corner
The southwest corner of the courtyard.
The southwest corner of the courtyard.
the estate

The estate wraps around the courtyard to the west, south, and east, is comprised of limestone blocks, and includes several windows on both floors. A balcony can be seen south, and doors lead to the first floor on all three sides.
tall stone wall
A tall stone wall nearly fifteen feet tall encloses the area's northern boundary.
A tall stone wall nearly fifteen feet tall encloses the area's northern boundary.
the raised, rectangular garden beds
The open-air courtyard's raised, rectangular garden beds are filled with creeping ivy and small ferns surrounding a maple sapling and statuary. Heather plants dot each of the corners of the bed.
The open-air courtyard's raised, rectangular garden beds are filled with creeping ivy and small ferns surrounding a maple sapling and statuary. Heather plants dot each of the corners of the bed.
stone wall surrounding the garden bed
A short wall of broad blue slate stones stacked one atop the other surrounds the raised garden bed at the center of the open-air courtyard.
A short wall of broad blue slate stones stacked one atop the other. It surrounds the garden bed at the center of the courtyard.
one of the newly sprouted vibrant purple purple snow-covered heather plants

One of the newly sprouted vibrant purple purple snow-covered heather plants. A low-growing shrub with vibrant purple bell-shaped flowers that sprout from the tips of each thin stalk. There are four placed in the garden bed, one at each corner.

One of the newly sprouted vibrant purple purple snow-covered heather plants. A low-growing shrub with vibrant purple bell-shaped flowers that sprout from the tips of each thin stalk. There are four placed in the garden bed, one at each corner.
the newly sprouted vibrant purple purple snow-covered heather plants

The newly sprouted vibrant purple purple snow-covered heather plants. A low-growing shrub with vibrant purple bell-shaped flowers that sprout from the tips of each thin stalk. There are four placed in the garden bed, one at each corner.

The newly sprouted vibrant purple purple snow-covered heather plants. A low-growing shrub with vibrant purple bell-shaped flowers that sprout from the tips of each thin stalk. There are four placed in the garden bed, one at each corner.
the bright green green dark green snow-covered creeping ivy
The bright green green dark green snow-covered creeping ivy provides ground cover for the raised garden bed.
The bright green green dark green snow-covered creeping ivy provides ground cover for the raised garden bed.
sturdy oak balustrade
Lacquered to preserve the wood from the elements, this sturdy railing has been built from golden oak and surrounds the outer edge of the second-floor balcony.
A sturdy, lacquered golden oak balustrade surrounds the outer edge of the second-floor balcony.
bud-coveredleafysparsely leafedsnow-covered red maple sapling
A bud-covered leafy sparsely leafed snow-covered maple sapling with a thin, pale grey trunk.
A bud-covered leafy sparsely leafed snow-covered red maple sapling at the center of the garden bed.
the slate stepping stone walkway
Broad blue slate stepping stone walkways frame the raised, decorative garden bed and traverse the circumference of the open-airway courtyard.
Broad blue slate stepping stone walkways frame the raised, decorative garden bed and traverse the circumference of the open-airway courtyard.
the eastern wall
The eastern wall of the open-air courtyard is comprised of limestone.
The eastern wall of the open-air courtyard is comprised of limestone.
the southern wall
The southern wall of the open-air courtyard is comprised of limestone.
The southern wall.
the western wall
The western wall of the open-air courtyard is comprised of limestone.
The western wall.
one of the windows of the estate
Several windows can be seen on both floors of the estate.
the windows of the estate
Several windows can be seen on both floors of the estate.

Core:Properties.Core:Property: X[S] \{ \ \{ A young man passes through the courtyard, nodding in passing before leaving through the door through the stone wall to the north. \| A flicker of movement catches your eye as a curtain in one of the windows of the estate is pulled back. \| A window on the second story opens for a moment. After a while it is shut once more. \| A small songbird flutters into the area, sitting upon a branch of the sapling to preen before taking flight again. \| The bustle of the city outside the walls of the courtyard are muffled by the height of the walls. \| A young servant girl moves through the area with a heavily laden basket. She curtsies silently before disappearing into the estate. \| The sound of heated arguing can be heard dully through one of the second story windows of the estate. \| The clang of horseshoes passes by, the sound dulled by the height of the stone walls. \| A breeze manages to shift through the area, softly buffeting the branches of the sapling. \| Overhead, the sound of footsteps pauses on the balcony before the individual retreats back into the estate. \} \ \ \{ A sputtering light inside the estate can be seen through the curtains of one of the windows before it is extinguished. \| One of the windows of the estate blooms to light as a candle is lit within. \| A parting of one of the curtains in the windows causes a slice of light to cut through the area before the curtain is drawn closed once more. \| The courtyard is cast in deep shadow as night blankets the area. \| For a moment, all is still and quiet in the protected sanctuary of the walled courtyard. \| The night sky overhead casts the courtyard in deep shadow. \| With a faint scent of wood smoke, the air of the courtyard is briefly buffeted by a breeze. \| A caped gentleman enters through the northern door, tipping his hat in passing as he strides into the estate. \| A peel of laughter can be heard from within the estate, the sound dim and muffled by the closed window. \| A soft hoot from somewhere distant penetrates the night air. \} \ \}

X[S] \{ \ \{ A young man passes through the courtyard, nodding in passing before leaving through the door through the stone wall to the north. \| A flicker of movement catches your eye as a curtain in one of the windows of the estate is pulled back. \| A window on the second story opens for a moment. After a while it is shut once more. \| A small songbird flutters into the area, sitting upon a branch of the sapling to preen before taking flight again. \| The bustle of the city outside the walls of the courtyard are muffled by the height of the walls. \| A young servant girl moves through the area with a heavily laden basket. She curtsies silently before disappearing into the estate. \| The sound of heated arguing can be heard dully through one of the second story windows of the estate. \| The clang of horseshoes passes by, the sound dulled by the height of the stone walls. \| A breeze manages to shift through the area, softly buffeting the branches of the sapling. \| Overhead, the sound of footsteps pauses on the balcony before the individual retreats back into the estate. \} \ \ \{ A sputtering light inside the estate can be seen through the curtains of one of the windows before it is extinguished. \| One of the windows of the estate blooms to light as a candle is lit within. \| A parting of one of the curtains in the windows causes a slice of light to cut through the area before the curtain is drawn closed once more. \| The courtyard is cast in deep shadow as night blankets the area. \| For a moment, all is still and quiet in the protected sanctuary of the walled courtyard. \| The night sky overhead casts the courtyard in deep shadow. \| With a faint scent of wood smoke, the air of the courtyard is briefly buffeted by a breeze. \| A caped gentleman enters through the northern door, tipping his hat in passing as he strides into the estate. \| A peel of laughter can be heard from within the estate, the sound dim and muffled by the closed window. \| A soft hoot from somewhere distant penetrates the night air. \} \ \}
